summary: Adjusted vendor API route prefix to /api/v1/beautybooking/vendor and updated tests; bypassed default auth for vendor.api; added schedule_order seed in vendor tests; added null-safe image URL in BeautyServiceCategory; changed staff delete assertion to soft delete.
